title: Lakshmi Kamal Ring - Ruby & Diamond Floral Design
features: Features a classic floral motif with a centrally set oval-cut ruby. Surrounded by delicately placed Polki diamonds adding brilliance. The gold lattice design offers a light and comfortable wear, reflecting Hyderabadi jewelry craftsmanship.
occasions: or as a statement piece for special occasions. Also suitable as a traditional gift for celebrations such as Seemantham or festivals.
description: This ring is a blend of traditional Indian aesthetics and modern wearability. The vibrant ruby symbolizes love and passion, making it a timeless and meaningful piece. The detailed gold work showcases the skill of our artisans, ensuring a high-quality, durable investment. The unique Polki diamond setting is a reflection of classic Hyderabadi jewelry.
